name.str_pl: copies of Black Dragons: Swamp Ruins

description: This book details black dragons: The most evil of dragons, who live in ruins generally in swamps.  Immune to acid and breathe acid.  The book also details how to prepare its hide and craft various armors that make use of some of its acid resistance.

name.str: A Comprehensive Analysis on Black Dragons
name.str_pl: copies of A Comprehensive Analysis on Black Dragons

description: This book painstakingly delves into the history of black dragons, gruesomely detailing their acts, the cults that worship them, and those that oppose them.  In its pages are some alchemical formulae that can be concocted using the remains of dead black dragons.

name.str_pl: copies of A Beginner's Guide to Alchemy

description: A paperback tome for the art of liquid magic, alcohol not included.

name.str_pl: copies of A Soulbinder's Guide to Necromancy

description: A paperback tome for the art of binding undead creatures' souls to dolls, along with emulating their healing factor.
Small old notebook without cover.  There are some illegal potion recipes, that you can't find in common books
Huge, hardcover book, filled with the most detailed information about alchemy history, usage, and future, authored by Trismegistus.  Modern edition, published by Noita Press.

A paperback tome for the art of combining modern technology with magic.  There is a disclaimer on the back: `Cannith Industries bears no responsibility for malfunctions or accidents for any products mentioned herein`.

name.str: The Weapons of Asgard and Beyond
name.str_pl: copies of The Weapons of Asgard and Beyond

description: An ornate book which appears to be written in Norse runes.  Based on the detailed illustrations, it appears to contain information about crafting numerous weapons used by various Gods.
A leatherbound book with an embossed cauldron on the cover.  Inside it describes ways to purify food magically.
A book with a brass coverplate.  It professes to teach one how to make magical metals such as Orichalcum.  It is dry reading even for an alchemical tome.

name.str_pl: copies of Protection from Magical Beasts

description: A leatherbound book with a picture of a shield holding back dragonfire on the cover.  There are many ways to turn monster skins and hides into protective equipment inside.

name.str_pl: copies of The Art of Enchantment

description: A paperback tome on the art of imbuing items with magic properties.
